00158         /*---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00159         /* The following functions must not be called by an application.       */
00160         /* They are the entry point from the stack callback functions into our */
00161         /* object orientated framework (APOXI).                                */
00162         /* They are implemented as static because they have to be passed as    */
00163         /* normal C function pointers. The reason for this is the BT-API Stack */
00164         /* interface that demands C function pointers for callback the         */

00166         /* operations                                                          */
